com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.runner

Class RuleAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.runner.RuleAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decision, Rule
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class RuleAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Decision
    RuleAdapter accepts a POJO annotated Rule class and adapts it to an actual Rule class.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuleAdapter

        public RuleAdapter(java.lang.Object rulePojo,
                   Rule rule)
            throws java.io.InvalidClassException
        Deprecated. 
        RuleAdapter accepts a Rule annotated POJO and adapts it to a Rule or Decision.
        Parameters:
        rulePojo - an annotated POJO to be adapted to a rule
        rule - the Rule object delegated to for the adaptation
        Throws:
        java.io.InvalidClassException - if the POJO does not have the @Rule annotation

      • RuleAdapter

        public RuleAdapter(java.lang.Object rulePojo)
            throws java.io.InvalidClassException
        Deprecated. 
        RuleAdapter accepts a Rule annotated POJO and adapts it to a Rule or Decision. This convenience constructor supplies a generic StandardRule to RuleAdapter(Object, Rule).
        Parameters:
        rulePojo - an annotated POJO to be adapted to a rule
        Throws:
        java.io.InvalidClassException - if the POJO does not have the @Rule annotation

        public Decision then(java.util.function.BiConsumer action)

        Description copied from interface: Decision
